content.html: People talk about "getting healthy" all the time in terms of eating more veg, doing more exercise, drinking more water -- but never feeling less stress. Stress is just as big a health issue as diet and activity. Focus on your health: reduce stress in your life wherever you can.
content.value:
People talk about "getting healthy" all the time in terms of eating more veg, doing more exercise, drinking more water -- but never feeling less stress.

Stress is just as big a health issue as diet and activity. Focus on your health: reduce stress in your life wherever you can.
